---
Song: ponvAnam
Film: indru nee nALai nAn
---
Notes: s r2 g2 m1 p d2 n3 S

ponvAnam panneer thoovudhu innEram
pS S SG  n  Sn   dp  p p   m pm grs

ada eNNam meeRuthu vaNNam mARuthu kaNNOram 
ss  s gs  sn.n.n.  s  mgm s n.n.  s  pmg gmp

Stanza 1:
mazhai pookkaLE othunga idam pArkkuthE 
mp p   mp  m mg pm   g  sp   mp  m mg

malar ambugaL uyir varaikkum thAkkuthE 
mp p  mpm mg  pm   g s   p   mp  m mg


mazhai seiyum kOLAru...  kodhikkuthE pAlARu (2)
g m    p  n   n RSS nSnS g m   p n   n RSS

ithu pAdalAl isaikkum kAman poojaikku nE..ramA (2)
SS   S n n   nn   n   ndd   d  d   d  pdn d pm gpmg

indha jOdivaNdugaL kOdu thANdidumA... 
s p   mgp mg s p   mgp  mg  g m pn nnnS

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
thanga thAmarai malarntha pinnum moodumO 
pattu poongodi padaRa idam thEdumO 
malarkaNai pAyAthO madhu kudam sAyAthO (2)
indha veLLai malligai thEva kannigai thAnamA (2)
mazhai kAman kAttil peiyum kAlammammA...
